<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1261</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Capital Choice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Hauptwahl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Choix Capital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Escolha Importanta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una Scelta Capitale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια κύρια επιλογή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una Opción Capital</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this WebQuest, learners help King David pick a new capital city. learners research the history and archaeology of cities in monarchic</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">king david</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capital city</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem WebQuest erforscht Auswahl des 
Anfängerhilfe Königs David Anfänger einer neue Hauptstadt die 
Geschichte und die Archäologie der Städte in monarchic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans ce WebQuest, la sélection du Roi David d'aide
d'étudiants de nouveaux étudiants capitaux d'une ville recherchent 
l'histoire et l'archéologie des villes dans monarchique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste WebQuest, a picareta do rei David da ajuda 
dos learners learners importantes novos de uma cidade pesquisa o 
history e o archaeology das cidades em monarchic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo WebQuest, il selezionamento del re David 
di aiuto dei principianti principianti capitali nuovi della città 
ricerca la storia ed il archaeology delle città in monarchic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το WebQuest, οι αρχάριοι βοηθούν την 
επιλογή του Δαβίδ βασιλιάδων μια νέα έρευνα αρχαρίων κύριων 
πόλεων η ιστορία και η αρχαιολογία των πόλεων monarchic</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este WebQuest, la selección de rey David de la 
ayuda de los principiantes principiantes capitales los nuevos de una 
ciudad investiga la historia y el archaeology de ciudades en 
monarchic</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">König David</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauptstadt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roi David</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ville capitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mais webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rei david</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cidade importanta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
